704885f-a.title: Brooklyn: Herkimer Street - Saratoga Avenue
704885f-a.text:
1108-1110 Herkimer Street, south side, just west of Saratoga Ave. A view of the Grace Episcopal Church. The building at the right, houses
the Republican Club.
May 6, 1936.
P. L. Sperm .
704885f-a.folder: Herkimer Street & Saratoga Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
